items.sentence: I have a feeling something very bad is going to happen.
I know that it is highly unlikely that anyone knows me.
I lit my last match, hoping that I could find the door.
I can be your best friend or I can be your worst enemy.
I cut myself with the knife right after I sharpened it.
Tom has already delivered the package to Mary\'s house.
Tom has no conception of what it\'s like to be in love.
I can\'t figure out whether you\'re stubborn or stupid.
Tom and Mary said that they probably wouldn\'t do that.
Tom and Mary seem to be enjoying each other\'s company.
